name: Rushed Dinosaur Dare
description:
Rushed Dinosaur Dare (RDD) is a game I made for the Ludum Dare 36 48h Compo. Included are the source code and 64bit Linux and Windows builds. The code is also available on my GitHub page

RDD is a CGA-style game (320x220 in 4-color mode) where you travel back in time to annoy a Stegosaurus. Updates will follow the initial LD36 entry.
